verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֞ר <WH1697> The word אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> came אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3414> that came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> from the LORD [בִּשְׁנַת כ] (בַּשָּׁנָה֙ <WH8141> year ק) הָעֲשִׂרִ֔ית <WH6224> in the tenth לְצִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH6667> of Zedekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah הִ֧יא <WH1931> which הַשָּׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> year שְׁמֹנֶֽה־ <WH8083> eight עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> year לִנְבֽוּכַדְרֶאצַּֽר׃ <WH5019> of Nebuchadrezzar

וְאָ֗ז <WH227> time חֵ֚יל <WH2428> army מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> For then the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon's צָרִ֖ים <WH6696> besieged עַל־ <WH5921> and יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> Jerusalem וְיִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <WH3414> and Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֗יא <WH5030> the prophet הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become כָלוּא֙ <WH3607> was shut up בַּחֲצַ֣ר <WH2691> in the court הַמַּטָּרָ֔ה <WH4307> of the prison אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> house מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> which [was] in the king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah's

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> because כְּלָא֔וֹ <WH3607> had shut him up צִדְקִיָּ֥הוּ <WH6667> For Zedekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying מַדּוּעַ֩ <WH4069> Why אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> you נִבָּ֜א <WH5012> Wherefore dost thou prophesy לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> and say כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> I am about נֹתֵ֜ן <WH5414> Behold I will give אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֥יר <WH5892> this city הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> into בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> into the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon וּלְכָדָֽהּ׃ <WH3920> and he shall take

וְצִדְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH6667> And Zedekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah לֹ֥א <WH3808> will not יִמָּלֵ֖ט <WH4422> shall not escape מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> out of the hand הַכַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <WH3778> of the Chaldeans כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הִנָּתֹ֤ן <WH5414> but shall surely יִנָּתֵן֙ <WH5414> be delivered בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> into the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon וְדִבֶּר־ <WH1696> and shall speak פִּ֣יו <WH6310> with him mouth עִם־ <WH5973> with פִּ֔יו <WH6310> to mouth וְעֵינָ֖יו <WH5869> and his eyes אֶת־ <WH853> [עֵינֹו כ] (עֵינָ֥יו <WH5869> eye ק) תִּרְאֶֽינָה׃ <WH7200> shall behold

וּבָבֶ֞ל <WH894> to Babylon יוֹלִ֤ךְ <WH1980> will take אֶת־ <WH853> צִדְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH6667> Zedekiah וְשָׁ֣ם <WH8033> will be there יִֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> become עַד־ <WH5704> until פָּקְדִ֥י <WH6485> and there shall he be until I visit אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> נְאֻם־ <WH5002> him saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֧י <WH3588> If תִֽלָּחֲמ֛וּ <WH3898> though ye fight אֶת־ <WH854> against הַכַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <WH3778> with the Chaldeans לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תַצְלִֽיחוּ׃ <WH6743> ye shall not prosper פ
וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said יִרְמְיָ֑הוּ <WH3414> And Jeremiah הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold חֲנַמְאֵ֗ל <WH2601> Behold Hanameel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שַׁלֻּם֙ <WH7967> of Shallum דֹּֽדְךָ֔ <WH1730> thine uncle בָּ֥א <WH935> shall come אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> to you לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> unto thee saying קְנֵ֣ה <WH7069> Buy לְךָ֗ אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂדִי֙ <WH7704> thee my field אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּעֲנָת֔וֹת <WH6068> that [is] in Anathoth כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לְךָ֛ מִשְׁפַּ֥ט <WH4941> for the right הַגְּאֻלָּ֖ה <WH1353> of redemption לִקְנֽוֹת׃ <WH7069> [is] thine to buy

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> came אֵ֠לַי <WH413> then חֲנַמְאֵ֨ל <WH2601> So Hanameel בֶּן־ <WH1121> son דֹּדִ֜י <WH1730> mine uncle's כִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> according to the word יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to me חֲצַ֣ר <WH2691> to me in the court הַמַּטָּרָה֒ <WH4307> of the prison וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלַ֡י <WH413> to me קְנֵ֣ה <WH7069> unto me Buy נָ֠א <WH4994> please אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂדִ֨י <WH7704> my field אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בַּעֲנָת֜וֹת <WH6068> I pray thee that [is] in Anathoth אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> which בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> which [is] in the country בִּנְיָמִ֗ין <WH1144> of Benjamin כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לְךָ֞ מִשְׁפַּ֧ט <WH4941> for the right הַיְרֻשָּׁ֛ה <WH3425> of inheritance וּלְךָ֥ הַגְּאֻלָּ֖ה <WH1353> [is] thine and the redemption קְנֵה־ <WH7069> [is] thine buy לָ֑ךְ וָאֵדַ֕ע <WH3045> [it] for thyself Then I knew כִּ֥י <WH3588> for דְבַר־ <WH1697> that this [was] the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> this

וָֽאֶקְנֶה֙ <WH7069> And I bought אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> the field מֵאֵ֛ת <WH853> חֲנַמְאֵ֥ל <WH2601> of Hanameel בֶּן־ <WH1121> son דֹּדִ֖י <WH1730> my uncle's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּעֲנָת֑וֹת <WH6068> that [was] in Anathoth וָֽאֶשְׁקֲלָה־ <WH8254> and weighed לּוֹ֙ אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> him the money שִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> seven שְׁקָלִ֖ים <WH8255> shekels וַעֲשָׂרָ֥ה <WH6235> ten הַכָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> of silver

וָאֶכְתֹּ֤ב <WH3789> And I subscribed בַּסֵּ֙פֶר֙ <WH5612> the evidence וָֽאֶחְתֹּ֔ם <WH2856> and sealed וָאָעֵ֖ד <WH5749> [it] and took עֵדִ֑ים <WH5707> witnesses וָאֶשְׁקֹ֥ל <WH8254> and weighed הַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> [him] the money בְּמֹאזְנָֽיִם׃ <WH3976> in the balances

וָאֶקַּ֖ח <WH3947> So I took אֶת־ <WH853> סֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> the evidence הַמִּקְנָ֑ה <WH4736> of the purchase אֶת־ <WH853> הֶֽחָת֛וּם <WH2856> [both] that which was sealed הַמִּצְוָ֥ה <WH4687> [according] to the law וְהַחֻקִּ֖ים <WH2706> and custom וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַגָּלֽוּי׃ <WH1540> and that which was open

וָאֶתֵּ֞ן <WH5414> And I gave אֶת־ <WH853> הַסֵּ֣פֶר <WH5612> the evidence הַמִּקְנָ֗ה <WH4736> of the purchase אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּר֣וּךְ <WH1263> unto Baruch בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נֵרִיָּה֮ <WH5374> of Neriah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מַחְסֵיָה֒ <WH4271> of Maaseiah לְעֵינֵי֙ <WH5869> in the sight חֲנַמְאֵ֣ל <WH2601> of Hanameel דֹּדִ֔י <WH1730> mine uncle's וּלְעֵינֵי֙ <WH5869> [son] and in the presence הָֽעֵדִ֔ים <WH5707> of the witnesses הַכֹּתְבִ֖ים <WH3789> that subscribed בְּסֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> the book הַמִּקְנָ֑ה <WH4736> of the purchase לְעֵינֵי֙ <WH5869> before כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיְּהוּדִ֔ים <WH3064> all the Jews הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> that sat בַּחֲצַ֥ר <WH2691> in the court הַמַּטָּרָֽה׃ <WH4307> of the prison
וָֽאֲצַוֶּה֙ <WH6680> And I charged אֶת <WH853> בָּר֔וּךְ <WH1263> Baruch לְעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5869> before לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> them saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֩ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel לָק֣וֹחַ <WH3947> Take אֶת־ <WH853> הַסְּפָרִ֣ים <WH5612> these evidences הָאֵ֡לֶּה <WH428> these אֵ֣ת <WH853> סֵפֶר֩ <WH5612> this evidence הַמִּקְנָ֨ה <WH4736> of the purchase הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> this וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> הֶחָת֗וּם <WH2856> both which is sealed וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> סֵ֤פֶר <WH5612> and this evidence הַגָּלוּי֙ <WH1540> which is open הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> and this וּנְתַתָּ֖ם <WH5414> and put בִּכְלִי־ <WH3627> vessel חָ֑רֶשׂ <WH2789> them in an earthen לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> because of יַעַמְד֖וּ <WH5975> that they may continue יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> days רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> many ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֥ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel ע֣וֹד <WH5750> will again יִקָּנ֥וּ <WH7069> shall be possessed again בָתִּ֛ים <WH1004> Houses וְשָׂד֥וֹת <WH7704> and fields וּכְרָמִ֖ים <WH3754> and vineyards בָּאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> in this land הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise פ

וָאֶתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <WH6419> I prayed אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אַחֲרֵ֤י <WH310> Now when תִתִּי֙ <WH5414> I had delivered אֶת־ <WH853> סֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> the evidence הַמִּקְנָ֔ה <WH4736> of the purchase אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1263> unto Baruch בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נֵרִיָּ֖ה <WH5374> of Neriah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אֲהָהּ֮ <WH162> Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3068> GOD הִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> Behold אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You עָשִׂ֗יתָ <WH6213> behold thou hast made אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> the heaven וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> and the earth בְּכֹֽחֲךָ֙ <WH3581> power הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> by thy great וּבִֽזְרֹעֲךָ֖ <WH2220> arm הַנְּטוּיָ֑ה <WH5186> and stretched out לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִפָּלֵ֥א <WH6381> too hard מִמְּךָ֖ <WH4480> is too כָּל־ <WH3605> there דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> [and] there is nothing

עֹ֤שֶׂה <WH6213> Thou shewest חֶ֙סֶד֙ <WH2617> lovingkindness לַֽאֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> unto thousands וּמְשַׁלֵּם֙ <WH7999> and recompensest עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> the iniquity אָב֔וֹת <WH1> of the fathers אֶל־ <WH413> into חֵ֥יק <WH2436> into the bosom בְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1121> of their children אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH310> after הָאֵ֤ל <WH410> God הַגָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> them the Great הַגִּבּ֔וֹר <WH1368> the Mighty יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> [is] his name

גְּדֹל֙ <WH1419> Great הָֽעֵצָ֔ה <WH6098> in counsel וְרַ֖ב <WH7227> and mighty הָעֲלִֽילִיָּ֑ה <WH5950> in work אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whose עֵינֶ֣יךָ <WH5869> for thine eyes פְקֻח֗וֹת <WH6491> [are] open עַל־ <WH5921> unto כָּל־ <WH3605> all דַּרְכֵי֙ <WH1870> upon all the ways בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of men לָתֵ֤ת <WH5414> to give לְאִישׁ֙ <WH376> every one כִּדְרָכָ֔יו <WH1870> according to his ways וְכִפְרִ֖י <WH6529> and according to the fruit מַעֲלָלָֽיו׃ <WH4611> of his doings

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who שַׂ֠מְתָּ <WH7760> Which hast set אֹת֨וֹת <WH226> signs וּמֹפְתִ֤ים <WH4159> and wonders בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt עַד־ <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> [even] unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> to this וּבְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and in Israel וּבָֽאָדָ֑ם <WH120> and among [other] men וַתַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> and hast made לְּךָ֥ שֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> thee a name כַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> as at this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַתֹּצֵ֛א <WH3318> And hast brought forth אֶת־ <WH853> עַמְּךָ֥ <WH5971> thy people אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בְּאֹת֣וֹת <WH226> with signs וּבְמוֹפְתִ֗ים <WH4159> and with wonders וּבְיָ֤ד <WH3027> hand חֲזָקָה֙ <WH2389> and with a strong וּבְאֶזְר֣וֹעַ <WH248> arm נְטוּיָ֔ה <WH5186> and with a stretched out וּבְמוֹרָ֖א <WH4172> terror גָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> and with great
